original_title: The Defector: Escape from North Korea
overview: Dragon smuggles North Korean defectors across borders for a living, and his latest undercover trip with Sook-Ja and Yong-hee takes an unexpected turn when they are left stranded in China. This is just the start of an extraordinary 5,000 km journey.

production_companies.name: Bell Broadcast and New Media Fund

title: The Defector: Escape from North Korea
